title: Japan : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: It is expected that by 2023 , around 117.5 millions Filipinos will become internet of a internet users .
Considering the forecasted population of around 118 millions , it reflects the high popularity of internet media in the Japan .

Current state of internet media in the Japan have been called the internet media capital of the world , because most of the internet media have an extraordinarily high usage time of about four hours per day .
gold: This statistic provides information on the number of internet users in Japan from 2017 to 2023 . In 2018 , Japan had approximately 117.6 million internet users . This figure is projected to decrease to about 117.5 million internet users in 2023 .
